entities.name: Articque
entities.description: A pure-play software platform provider focused on unlocking critical insights from geo-data analysis. Articque is a specialist provider of Location Intelligence (LI) analytics solutions. Articque’s pure-play and best-of-breed approach has propelled the company in the top-3 LI platform providers in France. Articque cumulates several decades of experience in developing innovative geospatial data-led solutions which transform geospatial data into strategic insights to solve a variety of use cases and business challenges, improve productivity, data experience, decision-making and innovation by delivering superior intelligence, and empower and accelerate clients’ strategies to drive growth opportunities, operational excellence and competitive edge.
keyStrengths: Cloud-based, powerful and scalable LI Platform embracing a wide spectrum of analytics requirements
Unique proprietary no-code modeling approach to facilitate LI application development and access by non-technical resources
Complementary modules dedicated to smarter data preparation and enrichment

entities.name: CDO
entities.description: The cloud-native version of the platform designed for SMEs requiring a limited number of seats.

entities.name: AP
entities.description: The self-hosted version of CDO with identical features, fitted for larger companies.

entities.name: GeoCodage
entities.description: A geocoding tool to convert large volume datasets of addresses into geographic coordinates.

entities.name: GeoService Data
entities.description: An enabling tool to tap into a wide range of third-party databases offering socio-demographic data.

entities.name: Carticque
entities.description: Provides a range of third-party domestic and international basemaps including administrative or business-specific basemaps.
